segments.text: From my view, the kitchen layout is straightforward with cabinets and counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area has the woman facing away, towel on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's running, basin full, overflow starting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming under her foot on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window open to the yard with bushes and path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes wait on the counter nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper cabinet open, cookie jar inside visible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on two-step stool, one hand in jar, other on plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool legs spread unevenly, leaning back slightly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands beside, arm raised toward the action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Lower cabinets show water streaks down the doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back on the window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a domestic setup with subtle disruptions.
segments.speaker: PAR
